import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { CardLocation } from '../card-location'; @Component({ selector: 'app-drink-list', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './drink-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./drink-list.component.css'] }) export class DrinkListComponent { //@Input @Input() cardLocation!:CardLocation; }
